refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the Modelica directory path needed by Xcos diagram containing Modelica blocks

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function is used to know where are the Modelica files used to define Xcos Modelica blocks.
If the user wants to define his own Modelica blocks, Modelica files describing the blocks must be indicated. The variable %MODELICA_USER_LIBS has to be declared as global before launching Xcos.

listitem.para: modelica_path: a string providing the absolute path of the Modelica directory containing the defining blocks Modelica files.
modelica_directory: a string providing the name of the Modelica directory where are created the files needed for the simulation.

refsection.title: Example

listitem.para: MODELICA_USER_LIBS: specify the paths of the directories containing the Modelica class definition files
